title: Bug 116564The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
OB: The title of the hyperlink builder is changing to 'www.actuate.com' when the 'OK' button is clicked and then the hyperlink builder is reopened.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should remain as 'Hyperlink Options' even after clicking the 'OK' button and reopening the hyperlink builder.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Click on the 'OK' button in the hyperlink builder. 2. Reopen the hyperlink builder and observe the title change to 'www.actuate.com' instead of 'Hyperlink Options'.
